Description:
ChartException when run and render chart with script.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Using runtask and rendertask to render a report with a chart using script

please reference to Regression_141941.java in tests.engine plug-in

Expected result:
No errors.

Actual Result:
严重: ReferenceError: "AxisType" is not defined. at line 175 of chart script:''

It has been fixed, the test plugin must set the context class loader and depends on chart plugin.
